title: ISecondaryMemberBetweenPointsFeatureData.RevDirectionLengthRatioMember2
description: Gets and sets whether to reverse the direction of the length ratio offset for the second member of the primary structure system member pair.
returns: True to reverse the direction of the length ratio offset from the end of the second member, false to not
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ISecondaryMemberBetweenPointsFeatureData::SecondaryMemberOffsetType
is set to
swSecondaryMemberBetweenPointsDistanceFromEndType_e
.swSecondaryMemberBetweenPointsDistanceFromEndType_LengthRatio.
